messages.title: Lawrence Hughes
messages.content: My birthday's in April so I'll be a first-time voter and I'm going to vote for Martin Horwood and the Liberal Democrats because they have the best policies for younger people.

messages.title: Cathy Green
messages.content: I'm supporting Martin Horwood in this General Election because fighting climate change has been one of his major campaigns and also because he walks the walk in his own efforts to lead a low carbon lifestyle.

messages.title: Paul Baker
messages.content: I'm delighted to be supporting Martin Horwood to be Cheltenham's MP again. He's done a fantastic job since being elected. He's helped people in all parts of the constituency. He was involved in the hospital campaign and saving the countryside.

messages.title: Klara Sudbury
messages.content: I decided to leave the Conservatives and join the Liberal Democrats because I was so impressed by the hard work that Martin Horwood has done for the town since he became our MP. Martin has put his heart and soul into saving local NHS services.

issues.environment: Fighting climate change has been one of his major campaigns.
issues.health: Martin has put his heart and soul into saving local NHS services.
